546.text: Primo Search as I might have mentioned is the Library's main discovery tool.

551.text: It is like any other online catalogue or search engine that you'd find in any other library

556.text: but it searches across both our physical resources such as books and DVDs

but you'll also be able to link to our
electronic resources from Primo Search.

So it's a great tool to use when you're
researching for your assignments.
